name: VNDetectFaceLandmarksRequest
desc: An image analysis request that finds facial features like eyes and mouth in an image.

items.name: protocol VNFaceObservationAccepting
items.desc: An image analysis request that operates on face observations.

items.name: var results: [VNFaceObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the face landmarks request.

items.name: class VNFaceObservation
items.desc: Face or facial-feature information that an image analysis request detects.

items.name: var constellation: VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation
items.desc: A variable that describes how a face landmarks request orders or enumerates the resulting features.

items.name: enum VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation
items.desc: An enumeration of face landmarks in a constellation object.

items.name: class func revision(Int, supportsConstellation: VNRequestFaceLandmarksConstellation) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a revision supports a constellation.
